concept.title: Video Sources
concept.shortdesc: There are many video sources to choose from to display in OBS.

ul.li: Browser: adds your browser as a source
Color Source: adds a solid color as a source
Display Capture: adds the entire monitor as a source
Game Capture: adds a specific game as a source
Image: adds an image as a source
Image Slide Show: adds a set of images as a source
Media Source: adds a supported media type as a source
Scene: adds an OBS scene as a source
Text: adds text as a source
VLC Video Source: adds the VLC media player as a source
Video Capture Device: adds the output from a video capture device as a source
Window Capture: adds any window as a source
